title: Managing Property Listings on BALL
subtitle: Effortlessly manage and showcase your properties to potential buyers with BALL's intuitive listing management tools.

steps.title: Access Your Dashboard
steps.description: Log in to your BALL account and navigate to your dashboard. Click on the property card or 'Properties' in the sidebar.

steps.title: Add New Property
steps.description: Click on the 'Add New Property' button to create a new property listing. Fill in the required details, such as property type, location, price, and description, and upload high-quality images to showcase your property effectively.

note.text: High-quality images attract more potential buyers. Ensure your images are clear and well-lit.
We offer professional photography services to help you capture your property in the best light. Contact us for more information.

steps.title: Add Property Information
steps.description: Provide detailed information about your property, such as the name, number of bedrooms, bathrooms, and other amenities.

note.text: You can manually type your house type by clicking 'Type Manually'. Switch back to the dropdown by clicking 'Select House Type'.
Add additional features by typing the new feature and pressing a comma to include it.

steps.title: Add Property Details
steps.description: Provide detailed information about your property, including price, units, title document, pricing model, and delivery state.

note.text: Update the property units to reflect the number of units available for sale.
We support the following pricing models: Outright, Timeline, and Milestone payments. Learn more about them here.

steps.title: Add Property Address
steps.description: Provide the address of the property, including the street address, city, and state. Currently, only properties in Nigeria are supported.

note.text: Include the property's area of interest to help potential buyers locate it easily.

steps.title: Add Property Description
steps.description: Provide a description of the property, including features, amenities, and other selling points.

note.text: Click 'Autogenerate' to create a description based on the property's features and amenities.
Autogenerating the description will overwrite any existing description. Proceed with caution.

steps.title: Add Property Images
steps.description: Upload property images to showcase it effectively. These will be displayed on the property card.

note.text: Supported image formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, and GIF. Ensure your images are clear and well-lit.
Images are capped at 1MB to improve website speed. Use an online compressor like https://tinypng.com to reduce the size of larger images.
